mapper.select: SELECT MONTH(orderTime) AS MONTH, SUM(((g.number * c.price) - (g.number * c.purchasePrice)) * 0.05) AS storeRental FROM order_info o LEFT JOIN order_goods g ON o.orderid = g.orderid LEFT JOIN commodity c ON g.goodsid = c.cId WHERE o.storeid=#{storeid} AND o.state3=#{state3} GROUP BY MONTH(orderTime)
